title: Sidewall, "Drywall #7", 2013
medium: Inkjet print on nylon reinforced paper
provenance: Given new to Cooper-Hewitt by the artist in 2014.
dimensions: L x W (design): 243.8 x 121.9 cm (8 ft. x 48 in.)
description: Photographically captured panel of drywall or sheetrock marked with graphite and prepped with joint compound, one of a series of ten different panels.

tombstone.epitaph: Sidewall, "Drywall #7", 2013. Inkjet print on nylon reinforced paper. Gift of Urs Fischer. 2014-37-7.
